Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.services.impl

Class PusherService

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.services.impl.PusherService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.pusher.client.connection.ConnectionEventListener, IPushNotificationService
@Singleton public class PusherService extends Object implements IPushNotificationService, com.pusher.client.connection.ConnectionEventListener
Connects to Pusher.com to receive notifications about newly purchased assets.

The pusher service instance maintains a connection to the channel for the synchronization tenant and executes the provided job on every received notification.

          PUSHER__CLUSTER = "eu"

      • Constant Field Values

    • PUSHER__OAUTH_SMINTIO_ENDPOINT

      public static final String PUSHER__OAUTH_SMINTIO_ENDPOINT
      The cluster used with the pusher.com service.

      The value is formated with MessageFormat.format(String, Object...) in order to fill the placeholder with the tenant ID, taken from ISettingsModel.getTenantId(). 

          PUSHER__OAUTH_SMINTIO_ENDPOINT = "https://{0}.clapi.smint.io/consumer/v1/notifications/pusher/auth"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PUSHER__CHANNEL

      public static final String PUSHER__CHANNEL
      The name of the event to listen to on the pusher service.

      The value is formated with MessageFormat.format(String, Object...) in order to fill the // * placeholder with the channel ID, taken from ISettingsModel.getChannelId(). 

          PUSHER__EVENT_NAME = "global-transaction-history-update"
      See Also:
